summary: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.
synopsis: Circumstances force Arun, an aspiring film director, to take up the job of a Sub Inspector after his father passes away. While Arun faces issues in adjusting to the lifestyle of a police officer, a series of mysterious murders of school going girls happen in the city.
trivia: Took two years for the director to finish the script, he wanted to do a serious film for his second project hence he chose a psycho killer concept.
